comment.text: This translation key is used to display an amount of additional storage in a user interface. It is typically shown on a plan preview or upgrade dialog, providing users with information about the extra storage capacity available. The amount should be displayed as "Additional X Gigabyte", where X is the actual amount.

usage.context: {t("AdditionalStorage", { amount: `${calculateDifference(amount, currentStoragePlanSize!)} ${t("Common:Gigabyte")}`, })}
